Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.ClientController
public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
represents the controller in the client side

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Square builderSquare
    represents the square on which the builder is placed

    represent the client to which the controller is linked

    represents the boolean that tells if the player is building a dome

    represents all the possible moves available to a builder
    java.lang.Boolean setup
    represents the boolean that tells if the client is in the setup phase or not
    private java.lang.Boolean stillPlaying
    represent the boolean that tells if the client is still in the game or not

      public Moves getSpecialBuild​(Moves moves) throws java.io.IOException

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • chooseMove

      public Moves chooseMove​(Moves moves) throws java.io.IOException
      Shows on the screen all the possible moves that the player can do and waits for the choice.
      Parameters:
      moves - all the moves that the player can do.
      Returns:
      the single move chosen by the player with the builder that is going to do that move.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • checkCard

      public boolean checkCard​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> choosenCards, int pick)
      checks that the card chosen isn't already been chosen by another player
      Parameters:
      choosenCards - are all the cards chosen by the other players
      pick - is the number of the card chosen by the current player
      Returns:
      the boolean false if the card is already chosen, false otherwise

    • checkSquare

      public boolean checkSquare​(java.util.ArrayList<Square> freeSquares, Square square)
      checks that the move is possible
      Parameters:
      freeSquares - is the ArrayList of all the unoccupied squares
      square - is the square chosen by the player
      Returns:
      boolean true if the move is possible, false otherwise

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard​(Square firstSquare, Square secondSquare)

      Parameters:
      firstSquare - is the first changed square
      secondSquare - is the second changed square

    • updateBoard

      Parameters:
      firstSquare - the square that has changed

    • resetBoard

      private void resetBoard()
      clears the client board of the colored possible squares back to white

    • getPosition

      public Square getPosition() throws java.io.IOException
      get the player inputs to where place the builders both in placement, move and build phases and checks that the move is within the board limits
      Returns:
      the chosen square to move
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - exception if the input is not formatted correct

    • chosenBuilder

      public java.util.ArrayList<Square> chosenBuilder​(Moves moves, Square builderSquare)
      highlights the squares of a single pawn
      Parameters:
      moves - contains the ArrayList of the possible moves for the pawn
      builderSquare - is the square where the builder is
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all the possible moves

    • searchArray

      public boolean searchArray​(java.util.ArrayList<Square> possibleMoves, Square chosen)
      search in the array if the move is possible to perform
      Parameters:
      possibleMoves - is the ArrayList of squares of all the possible moves
      chosen - is the square chosen to perform the build
      Returns:
      boolean, true if the move is possible, false otherwise

    • returnBuilder

      public Builder returnBuilder​(Square builderSquare, Moves moves)
      gives back the builder on the given square
      Parameters:
      builderSquare - is the square where the builder is placed
      moves - are the moves that are possible to perform
      Returns:
      builder on the square if it is on it, null otherwise

    • returnBoolean

      public boolean returnBoolean() throws java.io.IOException
      gives back if the player wants to perform a special move
      Returns:
      the decision via boolean parameter, true if yes, false otherwise
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - exception for the send method

      Returns:
      the player number
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - exception if the input format is not correct

    • wrongUserName

      public void wrongUserName()

    • printMatchInfo

      public void printMatchInfo​(java.lang.String playerID, java.lang.String playerColour, java.lang.String playerCard)
      this method prints the match's player during its turn, their colour and card.
      Parameters:
      playerID - is the player name.
      playerColour - is the player colour.
      playerCard - is the the player chosen deity.
